verses.verse: Then again <WH7725> I lifted up <WH5375> my eyes, <WH5869> and saw, <WH7200> and behold, <WH5774> a flying scroll. <WH4039>

He said <WH559> to me, <WH7200> "What do you see?" I answered, <WH559> "I see <WH7200> a flying <WH5774> scroll; <WH4039> its length <WH753> is twenty <WH6242> cubits, <WH520> and its breadth <WH7341> ten <WH6235> cubits. <WH520>"

Then he said <WH559> to me, <WH423> "This is the curse that goes out <WH3318> over the surface <WH6440> of the whole land; <WH776> for everyone who steals <WH1589> shall be cut off <WH5352> according <WH3644> to it on the one side; <WH7650> and everyone who swears falsely shall be cut off <WH5352> according to it on the other side. <WH3644>

I will cause it to go out, <WH3318>" says <WH5002> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies, <WH6635> "and it will enter <WH935> into the house <WH1004> of the thief, <WH1590> and into the house <WH1004> of him who swears <WH7650> falsely <WH8267> by my name; <WH8034> and it will remain <WH3885> in the midst <WH8432> of his house, <WH1004> and will destroy <WH3615> it with its timber <WH6086> and its stones. <WH68>"
Then the angel <WH4397> who talked <WH1696> with me came forward, <WH3318> and said <WH559> to me, <WH5375> "Lift up now your eyes, <WH5869> and see <WH7200> what is this that is appearing. <WH3318>"
I said, <WH559> "What is it? <WH559>" He said, "This is the ephah <WH374> basket that is appearing. <WH559>" He said moreover, <WH5869> "This is their appearance in all the land <WH776>
(and behold, <WH3603> a talent of lead <WH5777> was lifted up <WH5375>); and this is a <WH259> woman <WH802> sitting <WH3427> in the midst <WH8432> of the ephah basket. <WH374>"

He said, <WH559> "This is Wickedness; <WH7564>" and he threw <WH7993> her down into the midst <WH8432> of the ephah <WH374> basket; <WH7993> and he threw the weight <WH68> of lead <WH5777> on its mouth. <WH6310>

Then lifted I up <WH5375> my eyes, <WH5869> and saw, <WH7200> and behold, <WH3318> there were two <WH8147> women, <WH802> and the wind <WH7307> was in their wings. <WH3671> Now they had <WH2007> wings <WH3671> like the wings <WH3671> of a stork, <WH2624> and they lifted up <WH5375> the ephah <WH374> basket between earth <WH776> and the sky. <WH8064>
Then I said <WH559> to the angel <WH4397> who talked <WH1696> with me, <WH3212> "Where are these carrying the ephah basket? <WH374>"
He said <WH559> to me, <WH1129> "To build her a house <WH1004> in the land <WH776> of Shinar. <WH8152> When it is prepared, <WH3559> she will be set <WH3240> there in her own place. <WH4369>"
